c74object.name: hoa.send~
c74object.digest: A multichannel version of the send~ object.
c74object.description: hoa.send~ is a multichannel version of the send~ object. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

c74object.discussion: hoa.send~ is a multichannel version of the send~ object. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: hoa.send~ is a multichannel version of the send~ object. This patcher requires to be loaded by a hoa.process~ object to work.

entry.name: Keywords
entry.description: ambisonics, hoa objects, audio, MSP, abstraction.
